text: Joshua Kyeremeh (died 18 January 2021) was a Ghanaian politician and administrator. He was a member of the New Patriotic Party. He was a National security coordinator for the President of Ghana. Kyeremeh was Director of the Bureau of National Investigations from 2005 to 2009. Kyeremeh died on 18 January 2021 at an Accra hospital from COVID-19. ==References== Category:2021 deaths Category:Year of birth missing Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ghana Category:Ghanaian politicians
title: Joshua Kyeremeh
